question: A friend of yours is thinking of going to a camping holiday for the first time this summer. He has asked for your advice.Write a letter to your friends. In your letter,Explain why you think your friend would enjoy camping holidaydescribe some possible disadvantagessay whether you would like to go on camping with your friend this summer
text: I hope this finds you good. In your last letter, you  asked me to give you some advice about summer camping.

I am glad this time you have chosen what really suits you. Since you are a photographer with a born talent, I am sure you will find this  an opportunity to take some snaps of wildlife. That is what you are really good at and I am sure you will enjoy it, a lot this time.

Though you will be enjoying capturing the wonderful moments of wildlife, there is a possibility that may suffer from the sweltering heat. That is the main disadvantage that I see. Please make sure you take to take some additional clothes to cover up  yourself while you stay outside.
I wish I could join you this time, but due to some urgent office, I may not be able to join. But I will try my best to join you.
Let me stop here. Write again if you need any more information.
